text: Theatre of Halicarnassus in Bodrum, with the Bodrum Castle seen in the background. Bodrum International Ballet Festival (Turkish: Uluslararası Bodrum Bale Festivali) is an annual international ballet festival held in the Turkish port city Bodrum. Organised by Turkish State Opera and Ballet since 2002, the festival takes place during summer, usually around July and August. Bodrum Castle and Theatre of Halicarnassus are the main event venues during the festival. Both national and international ballet groups and performers such as Vienna State Ballet, Sukhishvili Georgian National Ballet, Svetlana Zakharova, and Alonzo King LINES Ballet have performed in the event since its beginning. == See also == * Turkish State Opera and Ballet * Bodrum * List of festivals in Turkey == References == == External links == * Flyer of the 17th Bodrum International Ballet Festival Category:Ballet in Turkey Category:Festivals in Turkey Category:2002 establishments in Turkey Category:Festivals established in 2002 Category:Summer events in Turkey
title: Bodrum International Ballet Festival
